## findNodesTableForParent() function

Find all of the node rows for communities that share a parent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function findNodesTableForParent(pid: string, byParent: ColumnTable): ColumnTable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pid | string | parent id |
|  byParent | ColumnTable | table grouped by parent |

<b>Returns:</b>

ColumnTable
